name: Multi-coloured dragon scalemail
data: It increases the users strength adequately.
It decreases the users dexterity poorly.
It increases the users constitution impressively.
It has great armour class for its type (adequate in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration impressively.
It increases the users poison resistance strongly.
It increases the users electric resistance somewhat.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It increases the users acid resistance somewhat.
It increases the users fire resistance strongly.
It increases the users cold resistance somewhat.
